string-array.name: wwzdstrings
string-array.item: I\'d buy a yak, paint it blue, and consider the problem solved
I\'d build an Ark, and I\'d build a big room for poo. I\'d call it the poop deck... HAH!
I\'d run away screaming.
Figure out where the problem lies, and then punch it in the face for lying.
I\'d hit it.
I\'d provide a distraction by faking a convulsion.
I\'d eat a handful of dirt.
I\'d pee in your shoes... again.
I\'d draw a stick figure stabbing a cow.
I\'d wet the bed.
I\'d hogtie someone and spit grape gogurt on them.
I\'d introduce club to face.
I honestly have no idea what I\'d do.
I\'d try solving for X first.
I\'d check and see if history was repeating itself.
I\'d go rock climbing.
I\'d wait till you were asleep, squirt lotion all over your face, and take a picture of a stuffed animal humping your face.
I\'d have sex with a donkey.
I\'d throw spoons at them for half an hour
I\'d wedgie [other]
I\'d push a couple old ladies down some stairs till I felt better.
I\'d find the source of the problem and debug it.
I\'d kick drutro in the jimmy
I\'d beat an old man senseless with a 2x4
I\'d set wonko\'s hair on fire.
I\'d club ogg then grunt a lot.
I\'d set some rope, a midget and beat the candy out of it pinata style.
I\'d scream.
I\'d give myself a tattoo with Lye.
I\'d eat an entire tub of lard.
I\'d put a dead cat in a box and give it to you as a birthday present, then tell you "I was gonna give it to you last year but forgot it in the closet."
I\'d throw eggs at it.
I\'d pick up a club and hit it.
I\'d teach a man how to fish so he\'d give fish instead of me giving him fish because that\'s just dumb.
Two words: Angry Dragon...
I\'d stop talking and start kicking ass!
I\'d break things.
I\'d throw a chair like Steve Balmer.
I\'d invade a small country.
I\'d burn every book I could find about animal husbandry because THEY DON\'T HELP.
I\'d blame the French. Or Goblins. Close enough.
I\'d invite the neighbors over then burn their house down. Unless it was connected to my house.
I\'d hide under the desk until the bad people go away.
I\'d get on the phone then yell "SCREW YOU" and slam the phone down.
I\'d go get some steak!
I\'d go beat the candy out of some little people.
I\'d hide under a bed until someone laid down then make scary sounds.
I\'d... I\'d... crap, I\'d do something amusing I guess.
I\'d start by taking off my pants.
I\'d inform you I\'m not wearing any knickers.
I\'d randomly select someone from the channel and set their hair on fire.
I\'d do the funky chicken.
I\'d write a story of my adventures travelling with an angry penguin named Rufus.
I\'d start chanting "Developers! Developers! Developers!" then throw a chair.
I\'d collect some teeth and make a necklace.
I\'d think outside the box after developing a synergy with my core competencies
I\'d go back in time and threaten Steve jobs with a good clubbing aboust the head if he decided to go with a one button mouse.
I\'d travel into the future and challenge myself to a fight, knowing I\'d lose.
WTF do you always ask me? asshat.
It would be better perhaps if I didn\'t tell. The police are monitoring this channel after my last response.
I think you\'re a fed so I\'m not gonna answer
I\'d scream "HAVE AT THEE!" and pelt them with rasins
I\'d throw beanbags at them and scream "Lightningbolt! Lightningbolt! Lightningbolt!" and give up any chance of ever having sex with a real woman ever again.
I\'d read a book.
I\'d talk like a pirate for the rest of the day.
I\'d strap a goblin to my back and walk through an open market.
I\'d piss in your cornflakes while you weren\'t looking.
I\'d put a salamander in your shirt.
I\'d build a 1/16 scale model of an orc out of earwax.
I\'d probably babble incoherently for a couple hours, then run off into the woods
I\'d swing a troll around by it\'s nether-regions.
I\'d poke a muskrat with a pencil and call him Lucy.
I\'d hire a polka band and celebrate the chinese newyear early.
I\'d kick guido in the teeth and tell him he\'s a horrible actor.
I\'d DOMINATE doomboardgame.
I\'d play a game of checkers against a dog.
I\'d make a bootleg CD of "sounds from the mens bathroom."
I\'d cover myself with honey and roll around in a beehive.
I\'d fill the bed with mac and cheese.
I\'d commit genocide. But only against people with hair.
I\'d hit you with a limp wombat.
I\'d make animal sounds.
I\'d use a rabbit as a pillow because they\'re fluffy.
I\'d punch you right in the stupid face. That\'s the one on your head.
I\'d lick a penny.
I\'d put on a wool shirt and run through a carwash.
I\'d kick a puppy.
I\'d slap [other].
I\'d eat 42 deviled eggs.
I\'d do a little jig.
I\'d fight a Weebol to the death- I hear they wobble but they don\'t fall down.
I\'d lick a rubber aardvark. They taste like ants but don\'t bite as much as the real thing.
I\'d whet the bed.
I\'d eat some rubber buggy baby burger bites three times fast.
I\'d fire a bucket of monkeys out of a giant cannon.
I\'d cover you in holandaise sauce and then offer you a towel.
I\'d have some private time with your keyboard... wait, that was last week...
